definition: horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: The computation of the dam body stability is an important content in a tailing pond safety assessment.
sentences.chinese: 壩體穩定性計算是尾礦庫安全評價中的一項重要內容。

sentences.english: Hydrological zoning in tailings impoundments is the main reason for geochemical zonation.
sentences.chinese: 尾礦庫的水文分帶是導致地球化學分帶的主要原因。

sentences.english: On Monday, heavy rains triggered the collapse of a reservoir of iron-ore waste at the mine in Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 星期一的暴雨導致這個非法鐵礦的尾礦庫倒塌。

sentences.english: Zhangmatun Iron Mine is situated in the suburbs of Jinan municipality, Shandong.
sentences.chinese: 張馬屯鐵礦位於濟南市東郊，地表無處建尾礦庫。

sentences.english: The landless vegetation slope protection of tailing dams is a new technology in our country.
sentences.chinese: 尾礦庫壩坡無土植被護坡在國內是一項新興的技術。

sentences.english: As well, the paper described the treatment proposal for tailings dam closing in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細敘述了林沖尾礦庫閉庫治理流程。

sentences.english: The safety situation of tailing pond in China is alarming.
sentences.chinese: 我國尾礦庫安全狀況令人擔憂。

sentences.english: The process of constructing an underground tailings reservoir in Jinling Irom Mine is described.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了金嶺鐵礦建設井下尾礦庫的過程。

sentences.english: The general remark is introduced on environmental improvement of decommissioning uranium tailings impoundments at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了國內外鈾尾礦庫退役環境治理概況。
